featured.text: To receive treatment in a physical therapy office.
Lullabies, therefore, serve as therapy for the mother.
Currently a senior in college, Deborah focuses on pursuing a degree in physical therapy.
She had to spend countless hours in a physical therapy clinic to receive treatment.

definition.zh_def: 治療，特別是心理或情感上的治療，旨在改善個人的心理健康或情緒狀態。
definition.en_def: A treatment intended to relieve or heal a disorder, especially in the context of psychological or emotional well-being.
definition.example: She decided to seek therapy to help cope with her anxiety.
